seo.title: Minutes.AI Android release — Meeting minutes AI app
seo.description: Minutes.AI, the meeting minutes AI app used by 30,000 people globally, is now available on Android. Start recording on your phone today.
seo.ogDescription: The meeting minutes AI app loved by 30,000 users arrives on Google Play. Get clean, structured minutes on your Android device.

ld.headline: Minutes.AI launches Android app
ld.description: Minutes.AI, a meeting minutes AI app trusted by over 30,000 users in 150 countries, is now on Google Play.

hero.h1: Minutes.AI is now available on Android
hero.tagline: Minutes.AI, the meeting minutes AI app loved by over 30,000 users across 150 countries, has landed on Google Play. Start recording on Android and automatically generate clean, structured minutes.

release.p1: Minutes.AI, our meeting minutes AI app trusted by over 30,000 users on iOS and web, is now available as an Android app on Google Play.
release.p2: The initial Android release supports the Flexible minutes format. We will gradually add all other formats so you can use your favorite style of minutes on Android as well.

image.alt: Minutes.AI Android app UI on Google Play
image.caption: Minutes.AI Android version is now available on Google Play. Join 30,000+ users and start automating your minutes.

steps.h2: How to get started on Android
items: Open Google Play on your Android device
Search for “Minutes.AI” or tap the link on this page
Install the app and sign in or create an account
Start recording a meeting and let AI generate Flexible minutes
steps.note: We will continue to roll out more minutes formats on Android over time.

features.h2: Why Minutes.AI is a great meeting minutes AI app for Android
items: Automatic, clean minutes from your Android recordings
Proven track record: Trusted by 30,000+ users in 150 countries
Flexible minutes format optimized for readability
Time-pack and subscription plans to match your usage
Works across Android, iOS and browser under one account
The initial Android version supports the Flexible format only
Other minutes formats will be added in future updates
Meeting duration and available time depend on your plan and remaining quota
Network conditions and device performance may affect recognition quality
notes.foot: You can also use Minutes.AI on the web and iOS. Try the combination that fits your workflow.
